G

GameEnvironment - Class in main
Class where the main values and functionality of the game is stored
GameEnvironment() - Constructor for class main.GameEnvironment
Initialises the Game Environment
gameOver() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Sets gameOver to true
getActiveIsland() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns the island that the player is currently on
getActiveShip() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns the current ship that the player has
getAvailableCargoSpace() - Method in class main.Ship
Returns the available cargo space in the ship
getCapacity() - Method in class main.Ship
Returns the max cargo space of the Ship.
getCargo() - Method in class main.Ship
Returns a list of the items stored in the cargo.
getCargoValue() - Method in class main.Ship
Calculates the total value of the items in cargo.
getCrewSize() - Method in class main.Ship
Returns the size of the Ship.
getDailyPayPerHead() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns the cost of sailing per person per day
getDays() - Method in class main.Route
Returns the amount of days to travel to the destination island.
getDestinationIsland() - Method in class main.Route
Returns the destination island.
getDurability() - Method in class main.Ship
Returns the current durability of the Ship.
getEventChance() - Method in class main.Route
Returns the chance of an event happening on a given route.
getEventStrings() - Method in class main.RandomEvent
Returns the set event strings list
getGameDays() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns the amount of days the player has left in the game
getIslands() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns a list of all of the islands in the game
getItems() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns a list of all of the items in the game
getMaxDurability() - Method in class main.Ship

Returns the status of whether or not the ship needs repairs.

getPlayerName() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns the name the player chooses
getPrice() - Method in class main.Item
Returns the default price of the Item
getRepairCost() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Calculates the amount of money that the player will need to spend to repair their ship
getRoutes() - Method in class main.Island

getStartingmoney() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Returns the amount of money the player starts with

Returns the amount of times the player has set sail (used on the end game screen)
getStatTraded() - Method in class main.GameEnvironment

getTrades() - Method in class main.Island

getWeight() - Method in class main.Item
